column4: XnouMenon-> first  man update-alternatives  to give you some idea what to do next
olimpico-> what kind of printers? is the printer a network printer? attached to another host?
USB
They were working perfectly well, till the last update
is the printer dectected via  lsusb?
Yes, both!!1
But cups is not able to finde them
reinstall, do you think this will change anything?
do I have to remove it completely first?
yes, remove it first then install
But it says it will have to remove: bluez-cups cups-pdf cupsys cupsys-driver-gutenprint foomatic-db-hpijs hpijs hplip hplip-gui kubuntu-desktop
I did it, removed it and reinstalled it, now it doesn't see any printer
did it detect ?
lsusb detects them fine, but cups doesn't
what steps did you go through to detect the subject printer?
1)http://localhost:631/admin 2)Find New Printers
what about if you click on add printer?
I tried that, but the USB printers are not recognized
after even going through the steps?
Yes, after going through the step, and before I could find the printers automatically
i really dont know then why it does not detect it
Me neither
It's crazy!!!!!!!!
